name: Torkoal
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

poke_body.name: White Smoke
poke_body.effect: As long as Torkoal is your Active Pokémon, prevent all effects, including damage, done to your Benched Pokémon by your opponent’s attacks.

attacks.name: Black Soot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Paralyzed.
